Prayer:-This Civil Suit is filed under Order IV Rule 1 of Original Side Rules
r/w Order VII Rule 1 of C.P.C., for directing the defendants jointly and
severally to pay a sum of Rs.1,21,66,000/-to the plaintiff along with interest
@ 18% per annum on the principal sum of Rs.79,00,000/-from date of
plaint till realization and to pay the cost of the suit.
For Plaintiff
